Keywords: Celebrity , Fantastic Four , Scientist
Real Name: Reed Richards
Team Up
1
THEMED TEAM-UP: FANTASTIC FOUR: If Mr. Fantastic is on a Fantastic Four Themed team, he has Passenger: 3 but only to carry friendly characters with the Fantastic Four keyword.
Special Powers
IN THE BEGINNING: Mr. Fantastic increases his attack total +1 for each 4 in his (finalized) attack roll.
TOGETHER WE STAND: Super Senses. STOP, but only if there is another friendly character with the Fantastic Four keyword within 4 squares.
Trade Mr. Fantastic Want Mr. Fantastic

August 15, 2020
WelcomeToDIE
For those who want a Reed with willpower, outwit, and leadership, I have great news. The starter set offers a definitive Mr. Fantastic with all the bells and whistles you could ask for. But for those of us who like to pump most of our points into Ben, split most of the rest between good range support in Johnny and good defense buffs in Sue, and then just toss whatever is left over for Reed because he has to be in there to complete the team, this guy is indeed Mr. Fantastic
July 28, 2020
GL_Alex
Some say this dial is boring and uninspired, but it's a 40 point Mr. Fantastic that can fill in some points on a big team. Before this year we had to allot 100 points for Reed, so I am glad this is a point friendly version as many of the new FF are. My only gripe is that he should have some form of Willpower and Leadership should only be the first click, with outwit on the second.
July 22, 2020
DatHomieSilverSurfer
I guess it's a suitable Mr.Fantastic in the same way that the other super lower team characters have been(and better than most of the Justice Society got!), but I would have liked to see starting outwit and some 'Forming the Fantastic Four' trait giving him leadership. But for just 10 points more, you get entry to a significantly more interesting dial for the character (the uncommon dial) ...I've already forgotten about this piece since writing my first paragraph, in fact.
